News.headline: Daggers Player Live Commentry: Dagenham and Redbridge v Bromley
News.page_title: Daggers Player Live Commentry: Dagenham and Redbridge v Bromley
News.URL_keywords: Daggers Player Live Commentry: Dagenham and Redbridge v Bromley
News.short_description: If you are unable to make it to this Saturday's home game against Bromley, follow full live action on Daggers Player hosted by James Glass and Mick Payne
News.description:
This Saturday on Daggers Player you can get full, live commentary as the Daggers host Bromley at the Chigwell construction stadium. James Glass will be joined by Mick Payne, who will be swapping TV for Radio after his recent stint live on BT Sport providing analysis of the Daggers game against Braintree.
 
James and Mick are both qualified coaches and Mick has years of experience coaching at various clubs including the Daggers. The two will be discussing the various roles a coach can play at a club and giving some advice on how you can get your career as a coach starter.
 
The show has various features including ‘Neds News’ as local journalist Ned Keating gives his insight to the weeks activity at the club and ‘Mick Paynes one to watch’. Catch up on the latest transfer news as the two discuss potential new signings for the club.
 
Join James for live coverage from the usual Saturday start time of 2.40pm. Subscribe online for full access to the Daggers player here.
